body:
We are the official AVICUS COMMENTATING TEAM!!!!
we first started at july 2nd 2014 ( i think xD ) it was just jakesandobal, jozzmcozz,peaches_lovebird spectating a decay match then DarkArcher810 ( me )came along and asked if he could join the team then they agreed to accept me then puffy came and was now a member of the team we mostly commentate the nebula games :D to this day the avicus commentating team is needing new members we are also making Skype group calls and we are making other stuff for example a email and stuff related to that xD
People of the team so far
Leader:
jozzmcozz
Head Commentators:
jakesandobal
peaches_povebird
puffycloud5751
DarkArcher810
Members:
_quesadillas_
Our channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeLrRvICcDFzR3vMtsWkktA
Pics:
